00039 class WHIPTK_API WT_Gouraud_Polyline : public WT_Drawable, public WT_Gouraud_Point_Set
00040 {
00041         friend class WT_W2D_Class_Factory;
00042         friend class WT_Opcode;
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00047     WT_Gouraud_Polyline ()
00048     {}
00049 
00051     WT_Gouraud_Polyline(
00052         int                         count, 
00053         WT_Logical_Point const *    points, 
00054         WT_RGBA32 const *           colors, 
00055         WT_Boolean                  copy 
00056         ) throw(WT_Result)
00057         : WT_Gouraud_Point_Set(count, points, colors, copy)
00058     { }
00059 
00061         WT_Gouraud_Polyline(WT_Gouraud_Polyline const& pline) throw(WT_Result)
00062         {
00063                 set(pline.count(),pline.points(),WD_True);
00064                 m_colors = new WT_RGBA32[pline.count()];
00065         if (m_colors == NULL)
00066             throw WT_Result::Out_Of_Memory_Error;
00067         
00068         // set the allocated count.
00069         m_colors_allocated = pline.count();
00070         WD_COPY_MEMORY((void *)pline.colors(), pline.count() * sizeof(WT_RGBA32), m_colors);
00071         }
00072 
00074     virtual ~WT_Gouraud_Polyline()
00075     { }
00076 public:
00077     // WT_Object virtual methods
00078     WT_ID            object_id() const;
00079     WT_Result        serialize(WT_File & file) const;
00080     WT_Result        materialize(WT_Opcode const & opcode, WT_File & file);
00081     WT_Result        skip_operand(WT_Opcode const & opcode, WT_File & file);
00082     WT_Result        process(WT_File & file);
00083     virtual void     update_bounds(WT_File * file);
00084 
00086 
00088     static WT_Result default_process(
00089         WT_Gouraud_Polyline & item, 
00090         WT_File & file 
00091         );
00092 
00093 };
